#  100_cli_examples.qmd

```r
library(cli)

?cli
?cli_alert_info

text="This is the message"

     cli_alert_success(
       text,
       id = NULL,
       class = NULL,
       wrap = FALSE,
       .envir = parent.frame()
     )
```
```r
pkgs <- c("foo", "bar", "foobar")
cli_alert_success("Downloaded {length(pkgs)} packages.")

```
```r
cli_text(cli:::lorem_ipsum())

# mark as function or package
cli_text("The {.fn cli_text} function in the {.pkg cli} package.")

cli_text("Everyone's favorite {pi} ")
cli_text("Everyone's favorite {.emph pi} ")

```

```r
x=0
f = function() {
  x=10
  g = function() {
    x=100
    }
  }

f()

    cli_text("The value is {.emph x}")     # x
    cli_text("The value is {.emph {x}}")   # 0
```

```r
dlurl <- "https://httpbin.org/status/404"
cli_alert_danger("Failed to download {.url {dlurl}}.")
```
